name: oval-stone
effect: Held by happiny : Holder evolves into chansey when it levels up during the daytime.
short_effect: Level-up during Day on a Happiny: Holder evolves into Chansey.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.
